data.title: Emilia Fox's miscarriage heartbreak
data.meta_description: AS SHE prepares for motherhood, English rose actress Emilia Fox believes the heartbreak of a miscarriage led to the break-up of her first marriage to Mad Men actor Jared Harris.
data.text:
Emilia, 36, who is now expecting a baby next month with actor and charity worker Jeremy Gilley, explains that her and Jared’s relationship never recovered following the loss of their child.

They split in 2008 and were finally divorced in June.

EXPRESS OFFER: CLAIM £15 IN FREE BETS HERE!

“Jared and I had a fantastic marriage but we had the misfortune to have a miscarriage,” says Silent Witness star Emilia, daughter of Edward Fox. “We didn’t really deal with it. Then we hit crisis point. We couldn’t find a way of making it work.”
